long_description: Weighing in at only 82g and featuring 2 snag-free 'biners, the Black Diamond HoodWire quickdraw set won't slow you down on challenging sport climbs. Includes HoodWire 'biners on top and bottom that are linked by a 14mm-wide Dynex dogbone runner, creating a strong and very light quickdraw. Hot-forged HoodWire 'biners have stainless-steel wire hoods that keep the 'biners from snagging on slings, protection and bolt hangers. Rubber Straitjacket(TM) insert in the lower runner loop keeps the bottom carabiner in the proper orientation for easier and more efficient clipping. The Black Diamond HoodWire quickdraw has a 12cm-long dogbone runner.
short_description: Weighing in at only 82g and featuring 2 snag-free 'biners, the Black Diamond HoodWire quickdraw set won't slow you down on challenging sport climbs.
